title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content:
Cover image: A female Southern Carpenter Bee (Xylocopa micans) was collected while foraging on Blue Vervain (Verbena hastata) in Auburn, Alabama, as part of a USDA-NRCS-sponsored research project assessing the attractiveness of wildflowers native to the southeastern United States to native bees.

Photo by: Anthony P. Abbate
siteTitle: Wiley: Ecological Solutions and Evidence: Table of Contents
